# ffb_steering_controller


Simple Spring
```
0c01: power
0c03: 
0c04:
0dff: gain=255
setup: 161 1
030100000000000000000000000000
030101000000000000000000000000
010108ffff00000000ffff043f0000000000
030100000010271027102710270000
0a0101ff
030101000010271027102710270000
```

Assetto Corsa Rally:

setup: 161 1

0c03
setup: 33 9
